Text.Page:
Nagas seek the resurrection of Dagon and are collecting his tablets.

Allegedly, these stones will restore Dagon and enhance his powers.

We must get our hands on these stones at any cost. Feel up to a little tomb raiding?

Impressive. Whether they work or not, these tablets are quite remarkable.

You've done well, . Thank you.
We can't leave the Tablets of Dagon in the claws of the nagas. Whether they work or not, the nagas believe they do. Disrupting their plans can only help us.
